senderPipeline: pipewiresrc path={path} keepalive-time=30 ! video/x-raw,width={width},height={height},max-framerate=120/1 ! queue max-size-buffers=2 leaky=downstream silent=true ! nvh265enc bitrate=25000 gop-size=30 zerolatency=true preset=p1 tune=ultra-low-latency rc-mode=cbr ! rtph265pay pt=96 mtu=1200 config-interval=1 ! udpsink host={ip} port={port} sync=false
receiverPipeline: udpsrc port=%d buffer-size=4194304 caps="application/x-rtp, media=video, encoding-name=H265, payload=96" ! rtpjitterbuffer latency=60 ! rtph265depay ! h265parse disable-passthrough=true ! amcviddec-c2qtihevcdecoderlowlatency name=decoder ! video/x-raw(memory:GLMemory) ! glimagesink sync=false name=unity enable-last-sample=false qos=false
